#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,ec=0,oc=0;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        cin >> n;
        if(n&1)
            oc++;
        else
            ec++;
    }
    cout << (abs(oc-ec));
    return 0;
}
